  • registerForRemoteNotifications()

    Register to receive remote notifications via Apple Push Notification service.

    Convenience method is using .alert, .sound, and .badge as default authorization options.

    See also

    registerForRemoteNotifications(options:)

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public func registerForRemoteNotifications()

  • registerForRemoteNotifications(options:)

    Register to receive remote notifications via Apple Push Notification service.

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public func registerForRemoteNotifications(options: NSApplication.RemoteNotificationType)

    Parameters

    options

    A bit mask specifying the types of notifications the app accepts. See NSApplication.RemoteNotificationType for valid bit-mask values.

    tokenProvider

  • stop(completion:)

    Disable Beams service.

    This will remove everything associated with the Beams from the device and Beams server.

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public func stop(completion: @escaping (Error?) -> Void)
  • clearAllState(completion:)

    Log out user and remove all interests associated with it.

    This will remove the current user and all the interests associated with it from the device and Beams server. Device is now in a fresh state, ready for new subscriptions or user being set.

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public func clearAllState(completion: @escaping (Error?) -> Void)

  • setDeviceInterests(interests:completion:)

    Sets the subscriptions state for the device. Any interests not in the set will be unsubscribed from, so this will replace the interest set by the one provided.

    Precondition

    interests should not be nil.

    Throws

    An error of type MultipleInvalidInterestsError

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public func setDeviceInterests(interests: [String], completion: @escaping () -> Void = {}) throws

    Parameters

    interests

    Interests that you want to subscribe your device to.
    completion

    The block to execute when subscription to interests is complete.

    Parameters

    Interest that you want to unsubscribe to.
